metadata.name: Post Header
metadata.description:
This is a GitCMS object schema to get a standard and complete Post Header, the captivating section of every post.
It's composed of: title, excerpt, main image and tags.

excerpt.label: Excerpt
excerpt.description: A brief, short description, excerpt of what the blog is about.

image.label: Main Image
image.description: The main image, a cover for the blog.

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags related to the blog's content.
